code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{getWisataById}from"../api";import{Container,Button}from"react-bootstrap";import L from"leaflet";import"leaflet/dist/leaflet.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Detail=_ref=>{let{language,darkMode}=_ref;const{id}=useParams();const[wisata,setWisata]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{getWisataById(id).then(data=>{if(data&&data.longitude&&data.latitude){setWisata(data);const map=L.map("map").setView([data.latitude,data.longitude],15);L.tileLayer("https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png").addTo(map);L.marker([data.latitude,data.longitude]).addTo(map).bindPopup(`${data.nama}`).openPopup();}});},[id]);if(!wisata)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:`mt-5 pt-5 ${darkMode?"dark-mode":""}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:wisata.nama}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`/images/${wisata.gambar}`,alt:wisata.nama,className:"img-fluid rounded mb-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:wisata.deskripsi}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>window.open(`https://www.google.com/maps/dir/?api=1&destination=${wisata.latitude},${wisata.longitude}`,"_blank"),children:"Pergi Sekarang"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"map",style:{height:"400px",width:"100%"}})]});};export default Detail;
